Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2009 06:28PM murphygrady wrote: Ladies do not give up...appeal the MRI denial.  I am high risk(sister & mother had breast cancer) & have very dense breasts.  Mammo & ultrasound showed nothing.  I had enrolled in a high risk surveillence program which orders an MRI as part of the program.  First MRI was covered but MRI guided biopsy was denied.  We appealed, got it covered & they found stage 1 cancer.  I am opting for a bilateral mastectomy because they just can't see anything on the mammo or ultrasound with me.
Posts.Title: Insurance company will not cover my MRI blas dlb823
